text:
Hi, I have question about `BSON.jl` , specifically <https://github.com/JuliaIO/BSON.jl/pull/73>. If there any reason not to get this PR merged? It fixed rather annoying bug.
Is there more specific channel where to post it?

elements.text:
. If there any reason not to get this PR merged? It fixed rather annoying bug.
Is there more specific channel where to post it?

text: I dont know much about BSON.jl, but neither of those two PRs seem very confident of fixing the bug in all situations. That's probably the main reason they've not been merged. At the very least, they need more unit tests for better coverage.
